column4: troy_s:  Academic podcasting will be damaged by iTunes U as well, I blog about it here:  http://webcastinabox.com/openminded.
Pointless maybe, But you try getting multimedia companies to drop it.
FirstClass for starters, Then theres apple works which as yet i havent found a single open source office suite that can open AppleWorks files.
I wonder if GoBE Live can do that, it was founded by the same guys which used to work at ClarisWorks.  I should know, I used to be a part of that team as well.
